remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件时才会发生时控件设置属性或其属性是`true`。The event occurs only when the control property is set or its property is `true`. 处理事件非常有用，如果你想要确定具体取决于其状态以及它包含的值的行的错误。Handling the event is useful when you want to determine the error for a row depending on its state and the values it contains. 当处理事件，并指定错误文本中处理程序中，行标题中显示错误标志符号除非属性设置为`false`。When you handle the event and specify error text in the handler, an error glyph appears in the row header unless the property is set to `false`. 当用户移动鼠标指针放在错误图标上方时，错误文本将显示在工具提示中。When the user moves the mouse pointer over the error glyph, the error text appears in a ToolTip. 每当也会发生事件的值检索属性。The event also occurs whenever the value of the property is retrieved. 你可以使用属性来确定的状态或值的行，然后使用此信息来更改或修改属性。You can use the property to determine the state or value of a row, and use this information to change or modify the property. 此属性使用行的值初始化属性，该事件值重写属性。This property is initialized with the value of the row property, which the event value overrides. 处理事件使用大量的数据，若要避免设置行的性能损失时为多行值。Handle the event when working with large amounts of data to avoid the performance penalties of setting the row value for multiple rows. 有关详细信息，请参阅[缩放 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件的最佳做法](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此类型。The following code example demonstrates the use of this type. 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报告可帮助您了解当发生事件，并可以帮助您进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑替换与或追加到一个多行消息。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含类型的实例的项目名为`DataGridView1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `DataGridView1`. 然后，确保与事件处理程序事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event.
